casebody.data:
Christopher Charles Friscia and Maria Adriana Friscia
v.
Nathan J. Taylor, et al. d.b.a. Nathan J. Taylor, McGuire Woods, et al., Law Firm No. 246P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 13, 2016 Mr. Christopher Charles Friscia, for Friscia, Christopher C., et al. Mr. Nathan J. Taylor, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Taylor, Nathan J., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 28th of June 2016 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Mecklenburg County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of July 2016."
